orbotix.view.calibration
Class WidgetGraphicView

java.lang.Object
  View
      orbotix.view.calibration.WidgetGraphicView
Direct Known Subclasses:
CalibrationButtonView, CalibrationView
public class WidgetGraphicView
extends View

A View that can have many WidgetParts added to it, and will draw them each invalidation cycle.

Author: Adam Williams Date: 11/22/11 Time: 10:28 AM
